subject: JUnit Report Generation at RUNTIME
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am running my JUnit Tests for my Web Application (deployed on Weblogic8) through JSP. Whenever I have to test some stuff, I simply call my Test.jsp
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am running my JUnit Tests for my Web Application (deployed on
Weblogic8) through JSP. Whenever I have to test some stuff, I simply
call my
"Test.jsp" page to automatically load tests and perform JUnit Tests
at RUNTIME. Now, I was wondering if I can generate
JUnit-REPORTS for my test cases at RUNTIME of my Web Application.

I know that JUnit Reports can be produced using ANT, but I don't know
how to generate reports during runtime of my Web Application.

-Sumit
